course.intro:
This webapp is an experiment to leverage the course materials for COMP4711 at BCIT, making them easier for my dayschool students to access, and making them more broadly accessible, for instance to the CodeIgniter community.
Concurrently with my dayschool course this Fall 2015 term, there may be remote learners from around the world. The remote students will have access to the same resources as the dayschool ones, and will be expected to complete labs and assignments. I will give them feedback and grades for their work, but they will not receive academic credit for participating.
Something I will be asking all of the students to do is, to provide brief feedback for each component of the course!!
